import React from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import Navbar from "./Navbar"; const Home = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const animals = [ { name: "Cats", emoji: "https://placekitten.com/200/200" }, { name: "Dogs", emoji: "https://placedog.net/200/200" }, { name: "Rabbits", emoji: "https://placekitten.com/200/200" }, { name: "Birds", emoji: "https://placekitten.com/200/200" }, { name: "Fish", emoji: "https://placekitten.com/200/200" }, { name: "Hamsters", emoji: "https://placekitten.com/200/200" }, { name: "Turtles", emoji: "https://placekitten.com/200/200" }, { name: "Guinea Pigs", emoji: "https://placekitten.com/200/200" }, ]; return (

Welcome to PetPal!

Choose your favorite to buy and explore the various pets.

{animals.map((animal) => (
navigate(`/animal/${animal.name.toLowerCase()}`)} >

{animal.name}

))}

Follow us on:

Instagram Facebook Twitter

© 2025 Rohith Mangalaharathi

); }; export default Home;
